title: PSQL
content:
GET Last_Activity
```
select id,email,charge,to_char( now()-stamp, 'DD☀" " HH24"°" MI"´ "' ) as LAST_ACTIVITY from users order by LAST_ACTIVITY;
```
```
select id,email,charge,to_char( now()-stamp, 'DD☀️" " HH24"°" MI"´ "' ) as LAST_ACTIVITY from users order by LAST_ACTIVITY;
```

<hr>

Create Table
```
CREATE TABLE users (
    id             SERIAL  PRIMARY KEY             ,
    email           TEXT    NOT NULL    UNIQUE      ,
    devices         json    NOT NULL                ,
    charge          INTEGER NOT NULL    DEFAULT 5   ,
    purchased_items json    NOT NULL
);
```

<hr>

Insert Data
```
INSERT INTO users ( email, devices )
VALUES ( 'unifino@protonmail.com', '{ "0": { "name": "Xioami", "code": "XXX" } }' )
RETURNING *;
```

<hr>

Create | Replace Function
```
CREATE OR REPLACE FUNCTION trigger_set_timestamp()
RETURNS TRIGGER AS $$
BEGIN
  NEW.stamp = NOW();
  RETURN NEW;
END;
$$ LANGUAGE plpgsql;
```

<hr>

Assign Function (Create Trigger)
```
CREATE TRIGGER set_timestamp
BEFORE UPDATE ON users
FOR EACH ROW
EXECUTE PROCEDURE trigger_set_timestamp();
```
